attributes.action: Remove the power of the government to govern COVID response
attributes.additional_details:
Because everything the government has tried to do has failed, total lockdown has failed, the partial lockdown has failed, Tier 4 lockdown has failed and turned the UK into a pariah country to the rest of the world.

Policies and promises are made up on the hoof then promptly changed to suit the whims of a few without any thought to the socio-economic impact their actions have caused
attributes.background: We want the government to hand the power of decisions over response to the COVID 19 pandemic to non-government agencies and to remove the biased stance of the current SAGE committee

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "hand the power of decisions over response to the Covid-19 pandemic to non-government agencies". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want a change of Government, you may wish to sign this petition calling for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
